name: Kirby Fighter
description:
Hours of endless fun with a Kirby-themed 2D fighter game! Choose your Kirby fighter and conquer 4 unique levels with thrilling hazards to level up your gameplay experience!

With multiple attack moves and specials, this game promises to be a competitive battle every single time. Battle in 4 different environments including an ice blizzard, a lava cave and a dark forest. 

Local multiplayer support enables you to play with a friend, and supports up to 4 players for couch play. So what are you waiting for! Can your Kirby be the best of them all? Only one way to find out...!

Created by 

Anagh Kanungo, Jeffrey Liu, Yifan Sun, William Yang

Credits:

Stone Cold Orchestra - https://pixabay.com/music/upbeat-cinematic-soundtrack-stone-cold-orchestra-12909...

Art has been developed by us, with inspiration from Smash Bros and Kirby.
